page.title: 09Peak Dale Village Fete
page.content:
Kirsty Barlow. After the judges had given prizes to the winners of the competitions,I had two goes on the Treasure Map. Then I spent about three pounds on the Tombola.At first I only won tins of food like tomatoes and beefburgers,but later on I thought I would chance another go.So I did,and I won a bottle of wine.I went to show my mum.She was in school near the refreshment stall supping coffee with my Nana and Grandma.I showed everybody and then mum looked after it for me.I went outside to play on some of the other stalls. Later Bill Waddington went home and so did we.
Matthew Fletcher
